// ** React Imports import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' // ** Custom Hooks import { useSkin } from '@hooks/useSkin' // ** Icons Imports import { ChevronLeft } from 'react-feather' // ** Custom Components import InputPassword from '@components/input-password-toggle' // ** Reactstrap Imports import { Row, Col, CardTitle, CardText, Form, Label, Button } from 'reactstrap' // ** Styles import '@styles/react/pages/page-authentication.scss' const ResetPasswordCover = () => { // ** Hooks const { skin } = useSkin() const illustration = skin === 'dark' ? 'reset-password-v2-dark.svg' : 'reset-password-v2.svg', source = require(`@src/assets/images/pages/${illustration}`).default return (
e.preventDefault()}>

Vuexy

Reset Password 🔒 Your new password must be different from previously used passwords
e.preventDefault()}>

Back to login

) } export default ResetPasswordCover
